visual_desc: INT. LAMP ROOM - NIGHT. The lamp flickers, threatening to extinguish. <Sarah> (female, late 40s, short brown hair, wearing loose-fitting clothes) desperately adjusts the fuel flow. <Gus> (medium-sized, scruffy mixed-breed dog) pushes against her leg. <Sarah> is positioned on the left of the frame.
variation_reason: The shot only depicts the woman adjusting the fuel flow of the lamp, thus the variation type is small.
